1.0.0.Author:
Patrick O. Perry [aut, cph, cre],
Unicode, Inc. [cph, dtc] (Unicode Character Database)
1.0.0.Authors@R:
c(
person(c("Patrick", "O."), "Perry",
role = c("aut", "cph", "cre"),
email = "pperry@stern.nyu.edu"),
person("Unicode, Inc.",
role = c("cph", "dtc"),
comment = "Unicode Character Database"))
1.0.0.Description: Processing and printing 'UTF-8' encoded international text (Unicode). Functions to input, validate, normalize, encode, format, and display.
1.0.0.Title: Unicode Text Processing
